reviewText: Our 2 1/2 year old grandson loves it!  He's crazy about earth moving equipment and huge machines.  He sits and watches and talks about what they are doing.

He loves it! Asks for it when he wakes up and watches it all day long. He knows all the different types of trucks and when a new one comes on screen, he will point it out to anyone within hearing range. The only problem I found is that our disk says it has 4 shows, but the disk only has 3 (2 construction and 1 big rig), hence the 4 star rating. It's still enough to keep our son satisfied.
